name: UpdateBatchContacts
description:
Update a batch of contacts in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to update multiple contacts simultaneously in HubSpot CRM. It is helpful when you need to make changes to several contact records at once.

parameters.name: contacts_batch_update_data
parameters.description: JSON array of contact objects with unique identifiers and properties to update in HubSpot CRM.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: A unique identifier for tracing the request.

id.description: The id to be updated. This can be the object id, or the unique property value of the idProperty property

properties.description: Key-value pairs representing the properties of the object.
